definitions.definition: a business or an organization that provides a particular service especially when representing other businesses or organizations

examples.text: He managed to find a job through an agency.
I've signed up with a temping agency.
Details of the problem will be logged by the Help Desk staff who will then contact the appropriate agency.

definitions.definition: a government department that provides a particular service

examples.text: Some laboratories are operated by **government agencies**.

definitions.definition: as a result of the action of somebody/something

examples.text: He obtained his position through the agency of an old friend.

wordOrigin: mid 17th cent.: from medieval Latin agentia, from agent- ‘doing’, from agere.
